mapper.insert: insert into community values((SELECT NVL(MAX(community_no), 0) + 1 FROM community), #{room_no}, #{host_id}, #{community_category}, #{community_subject}, #{community_content}, #{max_member}, #{community_gender}, #{min_age}, #{max_age}, #{community_location}, 'n')
mapper.select: SELECT community_no FROM community WHERE room_no=#{room_no}
SELECT * FROM community c, room r WHERE c.room_no=r.room_no AND id=#{id} ORDER BY community_no DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM room WHERE room_no=#{room_no}
SELECT * FROM community c, room r WHERE c.room_no=r.room_no AND c.host_id=r.id ORDER BY community_no DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM room WHERE room_no=#{room_no} and id=#{id}
SELECT r.room_name FROM room r, community c WHERE r.room_no = c.room_no AND c.host_id=r.id AND r.room_no=#{room_no}
